name: VizHealth
description: A 7-week data visualization project for a group of four students. Multiple user-centered research methods have applied to improve the experience. The goal is to learn presenting information in a accessible and clear approach. The dashboard itself hopes to help potential users to narrow down on health insurance plans on the US market in 2020.

scripts.test-local: cd client && npm run build && cd ../ && npm run start
scripts.heroku-postbuild: cd client && npm install && npm install --only=dev && npm run build

author: Miaoxin Wang
